name: Puncak
description: Puncak is a popular mountain pass and tourist destination near Bogor. It offers breathtaking views of tea plantations, rolling hills, and beautiful landscapes.

name: Taman Safari Indonesia
description: Taman Safari Indonesia is a wildlife conservation and safari park located in Bogor. It provides a unique opportunity to observe and interact with a wide variety of animal species in their natural habitats.

description: The Jungle Waterpark is a popular water theme park in Bogor. It offers a wide range of water attractions, slides, pools, and fun-filled.

description: Trans Studio Bandung is a large indoor theme park and entertainment complex in Bandung.

description: Saung Angklung Udjo is a cultural center dedicated to preserving Sundanese traditional arts and culture in Bandung.

name: Ciater Hot Spring
description: Ciater Hot Spring is a natural hot spring resort located in Subang. It offers soothing hot mineral water pools surrounded by scenic views of the surrounding mountains and lush greenery.

description: Curug Cimarinjung is a stunning waterfall hidden in the natural beauty of Subang.

name: Gunung Tangkuban Parahu
description: Gunung Tangkuban Parahu is an active stratovolcano located in Subang. It is a popular destination for hiking and nature enthusiasts.

name: Kampung Cai Ranca Upas
